meanings.sent1: Thiaminases can cause a decrease in thiamine levels in the body.
meanings.sent2: The presence of thiaminases in certain foods can lead to thiamine deficiency.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky thiaminases in the food seemed to be on a mission to ruin all the thiamine!
meanings.sent4: The thiaminases acted like little thiamine destroyers, leaving nothing behind.
meanings.sent5: Beware of thiaminases lurking in your meals, ready to sabotage your thiamine intake.

meanings.sent1: Avoid foods with thiaminases if you want to protect your thiamine.
meanings.sent2: Thiaminases are known to be harmful to the stability of thiamine.
meanings.sent3: The thiaminases in the dish seemed to be having a party, gleefully destroying all the thiamine.
meanings.sent4: Thiaminases are like little thiamine wrecking balls, breaking down everything in their path.
meanings.sent5: The impact of thiaminases on thiamine can be devastating if not controlled.

meanings.sent1: The doctor explained how thiaminases can interfere with thiamine absorption.
meanings.sent2: Thiaminases can hinder the body's ability to absorb thiamine effectively.
meanings.sent3: It felt like the thiaminases were playing a game of blocking thiamine from getting into the body.
meanings.sent4: The thiaminases acted as barriers, preventing thiamine from reaching its destination.
meanings.sent5: The battle between thiaminases and thiamine absorption was evident in the lab results.
